00022     RootTreeGenerator::RootTreeGenerator() : Processor("RootTreeGenerator") {
00023         _description = "Processor to generate root tree for T0 currently";
00024         
00025         registerProcessorParameter("InputCollectionName",
00026                                    "Name of the input collection of Labview raw data",
00027                                    _inputColName,
00028                                    std::string("LabviewData"));
00029         
00030         registerProcessorParameter("OutputRootFileName",
00031                                    "Name of the output root file",
00032                                    _rootFileName,
00033                                    std::string("LabviewDataCERN.root"));
00034         
00035         registerProcessorParameter("BranchPrefix",
00036                                    "Name of the prefix of the branch",
00037                                    _prefix,
00038                                    std::string("ahc"));
00039         
00040     }

00045     void RootTreeGenerator::init() {
00046         
00047         _rootFile = gROOT->GetFile(_rootFileName.c_str());
00048         if ( _rootFile == NULL )
00049         {
00050             _rootFile      = new TFile(_rootFileName.c_str(), "RECREATE");
00051             _fileOwnerMap[ _rootFile ] = this;
00052         }
00053         
00054         _rootFile->cd();
00055         _treeLabviewBlock = dynamic_cast<TTree*>( _rootFile->Get("LabviewData"));
00056         
00057         if ( _treeLabviewBlock != NULL )
00058             streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "Reuse tree ["<< "LabviewData" <<"] " << endl;
00059         if ( _treeLabviewBlock == NULL )
00060         {
00061             _treeLabviewBlock = new TTree( "LabviewData" , "all information");
00062             _treeOwnerMap[_treeLabviewBlock] = this;
00063         }
00064         
00065         bool firstProcessor = (_treeFillerMap[ _treeLabviewBlock ] == NULL );
00066         _treeFillerMap[ _treeLabviewBlock ] = this;
00067         
00068         /*
00069          _treeT0 = new TTree( "T0", "First T0 chip129/channel35 and chip137/channel35 information" );
00070          _treeT0->Branch( "T01", &_T01, "T01/I" );
00071          _treeT0->Branch( "T02", &_T02, "T02/I" );
00072          _treeT0->Branch( "A01", &_A01, "A01/I" );
00073          _treeT0->Branch( "A02", &_A02, "A02/I" );
00074          _treeT0->Branch( "HB01", &_HB01, "HB01/I" );
00075          _treeT0->Branch( "HB02", &_HB02, "HB02/I" );
00076          _treeT0->Branch( "BX01", &_BX01, "BX01/I" );
00077          _treeT0->Branch( "BX02", &_BX02, "BX02/I" );
00078          _treeT0->Branch( "CN01", &_CN01, "CN01/I" );
00079          _treeT0->Branch( "CN02", &_CN02, "CN02/I" );
00080          _treeT0->Branch( "nHits", &_nHits, "nHits/I" );
00081          */
00082         
00083         
00084         if ( firstProcessor )
00085         {
00086             _treeLabviewBlock->Branch( (_prefix + "BunchXID").c_str(), &_BunchXID, "BunchXID/I" );
00087             _treeLabviewBlock->Branch( (_prefix + "CycleNr").c_str(), &_CycleNr, "CycleNr/I" );
00088             _treeLabviewBlock->Branch( (_prefix + "ChipID").c_str(), &_ChipID, "ChipID/I" );
00089             //_treeLabviewBlock->Branch( "ASICNr", &_ASICNr, "ASICNr/I" );
00090             _treeLabviewBlock->Branch( (_prefix + "EvtNr").c_str(), &_EvtNr, "EvtNr/I" );
00091             _treeLabviewBlock->Branch( (_prefix + "Channel").c_str(), &_Channel, "Channel/I" );
00092             _treeLabviewBlock->Branch( (_prefix + "TDC").c_str(), &_TDC, "TDC/I" );
00093             _treeLabviewBlock->Branch( (_prefix + "ADC").c_str(), &_ADC, "ADC/I" );
00094             //_treeLabviewBlock->Branch( "xPos", &_xPos, "xPos/I" );
00095             //_treeLabviewBlock->Branch( "yPos", &_yPos, "yPos/I" );
00096             _treeLabviewBlock->Branch( (_prefix + "HitBit").c_str(), &_HitBit, "HitBit/I" );
00097             _treeLabviewBlock->Branch( (_prefix + "GainBit").c_str(), &_GainBit, "GainBit/I" );
00098         }
00099     }
00100     
00101     void RootTreeGenerator::processEvent(LCEvent* evt){
00102         
00103         try {
00104             //fetch Labview data raw collection
00105             LCCollection* col = evt->getCollection( _inputColName ) ;
00106             
00107             //count elements in ChipID 129:0, 130:1, ... 144:15
00108             //init counter to 0
00109             /*
00110              int counter[16];
00111              for (int i = 0; i<16;i++){
00112              counter[i]=0;
00113              }
00114              */
00115             //bool _T01_OK = false;
00116             //bool _T02_OK = false;
00117             
00118             _nHits = 0;
00119             
00120             //std::cout << "1" << std::endl;
00121             
00122             //check all the ChipID, each one has 36 channels,
00123             
00124             //std::cout << "static_cast<unsigned int>(col->getNumberOfElements()) = " << static_cast<unsigned int>(col->getNumberOfElements()) <<  std::endl;
00125             
00126             for (unsigned int ielm=0; ielm < static_cast<unsigned int>(col->getNumberOfElements()); ielm++) {
00127                 
00128                 //std::cout << "ielm " << ielm <<  std::endl;
00129                 
00130                 LCObject *obj = col->getElementAt(ielm);
00131                 LabviewBlock2 lBlock(obj);
00132                 
00133                 
00134                 _BunchXID = lBlock.GetBunchXID();
00135                 _CycleNr = lBlock.GetCycleNr();
00136                 _ChipID  = lBlock.GetChipID();
00137                 //_ASICNr  = lBlock.GetASICNr();
00138                 _EvtNr   = lBlock.GetEvtNr();
00139                 _Channel = lBlock.GetChannel();
00140                 _TDC     = lBlock.GetTDC();
00141                 _ADC     = lBlock.GetADC();
00142                 //_xPos    = lBlock.GetXPos();
00143                 //_yPos    = lBlock.GetYPos();
00144                 _HitBit  = lBlock.GetHitBit();
00145                 _GainBit = lBlock.GetGainBit();
00146                 
00147                 //std::cout << "_EvtNr : " << _EvtNr <<  std::endl;
00148                 
00149                 _treeLabviewBlock->Fill();
00150                 
00151                 
00152                 //change the ChipID [129,144] to CID [0,15]
00153                 //i.e. 129->0, 130->1, ... 144->15
00154                 //int CID = lBlock.GetChipID() - 129;
00155                 
00156                 //counter[CID]++;
00157                 
00158                 /*
00159                  if( lBlock.GetChipID() == 129 && lBlock.GetChannel() == 35){
00160                  _T01 = lBlock.GetTDC();
00161                  _A01 = lBlock.GetADC();
00162                  _HB01 = lBlock.GetHitBit();
00163                  _BX01 = lBlock.GetBunchXID();
00164                  _CN01 = lBlock.GetCycleNr();
00165                  if ( _HB01 == 1) _T01_OK = true;
00166                  }      
00167                  
00168                  if( lBlock.GetChipID() == 137 && lBlock.GetChannel() == 35){
00169                  _T02 = lBlock.GetTDC();
00170                  _A02 = lBlock.GetADC();
00171                  _HB02 = lBlock.GetHitBit();
00172                  _BX02 = lBlock.GetBunchXID();
00173                  _CN02 = lBlock.GetCycleNr();
00174                  if ( _HB02 == 1) _T02_OK = true;
00175                  }      
00176                  */ 
00177                 int HitBit = lBlock.GetHitBit();
00178                 if ( HitBit == 1 ) _nHits++;
00179                 
00180             }
00181             
00182             //std::cout << "2" << std::endl;
00183             
00184             /*
00185              for (int i = 0; i<16;i++){
00186              if( counter[i] > 0 && counter[i] != 36 ){
00187              std::cout<<"Event number: "<< evt->getEventNumber()
00188              <<"     ChipID: "      << (i+129) //print in ChipID number, i.e. 0->129, 1->130, ... 15->144
00189              <<"     Entries: "     << counter[i]
00190              <<std::endl;
00191              return;
00192              }
00193              }
00194              */
00195             /*
00196              if( (_T01_OK == true) && (_T02_OK == true) ) {
00197              m_out(DEBUG0) << " Filing Tree ......"<<std::endl;
00198              _treeT0->Fill();
00199              }
00200              */
00201             
00202         } catch (  lcio::DataNotAvailableException &err ) {
00203             err.what();
00204             return;
00205         }
00206         
00207         if ( _treeFillerMap[_treeLabviewBlock] == this )
00208         {
00209             TFile* oldfile = _treeLabviewBlock->GetCurrentFile();
00210             _treeLabviewBlock->Fill();
00211             TFile* newfile = _treeLabviewBlock->GetCurrentFile();
00212             if (oldfile!=newfile)
00213             {
00214                 RootTreeGenerator* owner = _fileOwnerMap[oldfile];
00215                 _fileOwnerMap.erase( oldfile );
00216                 _fileOwnerMap[newfile]=owner;
00217             }
00218         }
00219 
00220         
00221     }
00222     
00223     void RootTreeGenerator::end()
00224     {
00225         if ( _treeOwnerMap[_treeLabviewBlock] == this )
00226         {
00227             TFile* treeFile = _treeLabviewBlock->GetCurrentFile();
00228             treeFile->Write();
00229             delete _treeLabviewBlock;
00230             _treeLabviewBlock=NULL;
00231         }
00232         
00233         if ( _fileOwnerMap[_rootFile] == this )
00234         {
00235             _rootFile->Write();
00236             _rootFile->Close();
00237             //delete _outFile;
00238             _rootFile=NULL;
00239         }
00240         
00241     }
00242     
00243 }
